name: Thomas & Devon | The Game
description:
A Coque-Abbey production, brought to you by candies, spicy chips, and coffee.

Thomas and Devon | The Game allows you to step into Thomas and Devon’s shoes and experience a day in their lives.

Select which behaviors are “on brand” for Devon and Thomas. If all of your choices are correct you’ll be able to recreate their perfect day.

Features:

  • Help the couple stay on track and make it to their perfect day
  • Test your knowledge of the happy couple and predict how they react to different situations (4 options)
  • 5 challenging levels
  • Offered in both French and English
  • Speed through character dialogues or take it slow
